channel.title: First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Introduction
item.description: First steps Introduction This app enables you to ovveride the default report layout depending on conditions that can be set up for each document type. The conditions can be defined by entering values that must be given for each field within the document. You can even combine multiple conditions to be met altogether. The setup can be easily done from within the report selection fo each department. After you completed the initial setup, every time a document will be output the defined report layout will be used instead of the default one.

item.title: Test & Purchase
item.description: Testing and purchasing of the Connector 365 Report Layout Plus App Here you will find all help and learning resources about testing and purchasing the Connector 365 Report Layout Plus App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.

item.title: Installation
item.description: First steps Installation Use the search function to open the Marketplace for Extensions and open it. The Microsoft AppSource will open. There you can use the search function again to find the Connector 365 Report Layout Plus. Click on Free Trial to start the installation. Before the installation starts, you have to provide some contact information. After submitting your contact information, you will be prompted to choose a language for the app.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installation of the Connector 365 Report Layout Plus App Here you will find all help and learning resources about installing the Connector 365 Report Layout Plus App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.
